text: Took over 3 hours to get my delivery and it was ice cold. Go support local pizza  businesses on Johns island that actually care about their customers.

text: Used to a good delivery pizza place for Johns Island. A lot better than the ketchup sauce dominos has. The delivery driver forgot my pizza though and its now been 2 hours and I still havent got my pizza. The manager gave me some bs about â€¦More

text: *FOOD POISONING* Ordered pizza from this location, and hours later experienced a violent spell of Food Poisoning. This was the only food ingested this day.
